description.value:
You can sense when it's time for a duel to take a fatal turn. Whenever a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} creature you can see within 60ft of you is hit with a weapon attack by a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.ZOBZ8V2YME5YOYZR]{🦁 Lionized} creature, you can use your reaction to spend 1 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point and cause the creature to suffer additional damage equal to your Presence modifier plus two rolls of the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} bonus die.
    If you activate this ability as a desperate action, it only requires the attacker to be @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.ZOBZ8V2YME5YOYZR]{🦁 Lionized} or the target to be @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized}, not both, and the bonus damage increases by an additional die.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
